Control Name: Involves Appropriate Levels of Management—The entity puts into place effective risk assessment mechanisms that involve appropriate levels of management.

control_attributes.Control: Involves Appropriate Levels of Management—The entity puts into place effective risk assessment mechanisms that involve appropriate levels of management.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.2 COSO Principle 7: The entity identifies risks to the achievement of its objectives across the entity and analyzes risks as a basis for determining how the risks should be managed.
